abstract: A new advertising system will mix ads with news on Digg and tie ad rates to the community’s response to the ad.
snippet: A new advertising system will mix ads with news on Digg and tie ad rates to the community’s response to the ad.
lead_paragraph: Digg has generated a fair amount of drama over the years as it has tried to work out how to turn a profit. The San Francisco company, which lets people vote on the news stories that interest them, has tried at various times running ads from Google, the ad network Federated Media and Microsoft, and it recently began to reach out to advertisers directly.

headline.main: Digg Will Charge Less for Ads Its Users Like
